name: RP Bastion - The Deep Blue Sea
description:
This is a Stylesheet to change the skin for the RPBastion.Forumotion.com website.
A RolePlaying centric Forum, Built upon the phpBB2 architecture. 

A Dark Blue central Theme
additional_info:
This is the first official version.

RP Bastion - The Deep Blue Sea Ver.1.0.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits & Other info:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I worked upon another phpBB2 website skin already available, But modified it for the RPBastion.Forumotion website.

Thus credits to the author "gollum" for his work in "Dark theme for phpbb v2 subSilver site" available here [http://userstyles.org/styles/4407/dark-theme-for-phpbb-v2-subsilver-site].

Just like stated in the other phpBB2 user style, this one can also work for another phpBB2 websites, albeit with some tweaking of your own.
